tool_description: Pass an email string to our API and we would let you if it's a valid email address , disposable/temporary email or from a free email provider.
name: EMAIL Validator
title: EMAIL Validator

api_list.name: EMAIL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
